General.Name: Tze Shin International Co Ltd
General.Description: Tze Shin International Co., Ltd. primarily provides transportation services in Taiwan. The company offers container, truck, and transportation and terminal services, as well as cargo, automobile, and car freight services; petrochemical and damage goods transportation services; long-distance container transshipment; container haulage; truck freight comprising chemicals; and bulk logistic services. It also engages in the leasing of containers, pallets, and equipment; trading and distribution, import, and export of transportation equipment; and sale of household appliances, sanitary ware, kitchenware, and other equipment, as well as hotel business and water recreation activities. In addition, the company is involved in the development, planning, and construction of factories, shopping malls, and residential buildings; sale and rental of national residences; and development and management of tourist hotels, as well as international trade management activities. The company was formerly known as Tze Shin Transportation & Terminal Co.Ltd and changed its name to Tze Shin International Co., Ltd. in July 2002. Tze Shin International Co., Ltd. was founded in 1973 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 33, Jianguo North Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 104
